title: Big changes are on the horizon for the travel and tourism industry
text:
Tuesday 15th September 2015 Big changes are on the horizon for the travel and tourism industry 
VISION OFFER: NEW Report, vodcast and special weekly update will help you take advantage of them - over 50% off special pre-release offer Within the next year… the UN will agree 169 new sustainable targets, at COP21 in Paris country by country emissions will be agreed, at ICAO next year airlines will agree emissions targets, the OTAs (including Tripadvisor, Priceline, Sabre, AirBNB, Expedia) will further change the global tourism marketing scene. If you are in the travel and tourism business it will affect you.SustainableTourism2015 will be your guide to take advantage of the massive green opportunities on the way... get plugged into it now!Its pedigree: Independent, market-driven, savvy, connected, inspirational, influential, authoritative, radical, sustainable, insightful and, naturally definitive ...A service specifically designed for travel agents & tour operators, destination tourism businesses & destination organizations.The release date for the first dossier & vodcast is 2 November 2015, following which there will be weekly updates.Whether you work in the outbound industry or a destination you can use SustainableTourism2015 to: Market and monetize tourism Find ever more sustainable profit-centres and mine them Avoid the coming threats and take advantage of the enormous opportunities Make yourself and your organisation real leaders Identify powerful marketing and financial mechanisms Identify coming trends and exploit them Make your activity better, stronger, more sustainable Work more efficiently, more enjoyably, more profitably See the woods and the trees! Product: Sustainable Tourism 2015 Dossier, Vodcast & weekly bulletin of inside information and analysis Title: Green Travel & Tourism massive global opportunities 10 Themes: See the bigger picture now, and the coming world of tourism with its social, cultural, economic and environmental implications The next few important years and how to take advantage of them Monetizing tourism how it works and how you can benefit The destination paradox and how to take advantage of it Sexy and Sustainable Food, Drink and other destination networks Tourism's Trillion Dollar Marketing Machine how to benefit Identifying and avoiding Key Threats Using Key opportunities Tourism & Politics what it will do for you. The world's 100 top green destinations Destinations and source markets to watch.
